programme.title: Expedition Killer Whale 1
programme.desc: In Antarctica, the most sophisticated hunting behaviour in the animal kingdom takes place - killer whales creating waves to wash seals off pieces of floating ice. A team of scientists and filmmakers travel to these freezing waters to find out more about these unique animals and how they do it. And one of the scientists is looking for one killer whale in particular. But their mission is not just to deepen our understanding of this extraordinary hunting behaviour. The team are also intent on learning more about the secret - and more tender side - of the lives of these killer whales.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Hidden Frontiers: Arabia with Reza Pakravan 1
programme.desc: Reza is in Saudi Arabia to reveal the secrets of a hidden frontier on the brink of historic change.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather 4
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to watch his favourite TV show with Billy, but Mrs Wicket has other plans.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball has, through gritted teeth, prepared a special dinner for Alan, to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels, Gumball is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mum being sick, and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind, but when he finds out his Mum really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: Looney Tunes: Rabbit's Run
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny is in for the ride of his life when he picks up a perfume salesgirl, Lola Bunny, who inadvertently created an invisibility spray. Now the whole world is on their tails!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput and the Docs re-enact the classic folktale – Robinhood with their own unique twist!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Daffy’s cool cousin Billy hires The Looney Builders to build her an art studio, Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Elmer Fudd is a guest at his own funeral.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: A newcomer, Blader Z, is stalking the streets of Xenon City and he also seems to have some interest in Blader X.

programme.title: All-Star Superman
programme.desc: Fuelled by hatred and jealousy, Lex Luthor masterminds a plot to kill the Man of Steel. Poisoned by solar radiation, Superman is dying.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin refuses to give the Titans any more orders so that they'll learn to think for themselves. Instead the Titans start taking their cues from fortune cookies.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Cheese and Dog tease each other for their respective lifestyles.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Bug’s relaxing afternoon is interrupted by a hungry Puma looking for a “hare-y” snack

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League : Cosmic Clash
programme.desc: When Brainiac zaps Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to different places in time, the race is on for Batman and The Flash to re-assemble the Justice League!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After Clarence and his friends call random numbers as a prank, Clarence ends up connecting with a girl and they strike up a friendship. But will it last?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven eats a bad meatball that causes tentacles to spring from her teeth and devour the other Titans.

programme.title: Hero Inside
programme.desc: X appears at Mike's house! Threatening Mike to hand over all the Hero Books, Mike ends up fleeing with Crying Man... and the secret about X's identity is revealed!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: After the Rustbucket breaks down, Ben, Gwen and Grandpa Max find themselves killing time at the local town library but soon scramble to out maneuver Hex as he searches for a hidden ancient artifact.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Finn and Jake decide it's time for Finn to get a new sword. Finn reluctantly buys a grass sword from a mysterious old man, but the sword turns out to be cursed! And unfortunately for our hero, all sales are final.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven works his magic and makes a pumpkin come to life. Lapis and Peridot are disappointed that the newly-living beast doesn't immediately take to them, but Steven (unknowingly) helps the pumpkin bond with its new gem-owners.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby work overtime in order to get tickets to a Fist Pump concert. While working, they drink lots of coffee to keep them active.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Chowder gets possessed by a demon bird named Florentine, and it's up to Mung, Truffles and Shnitzel to save him.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: When an evil, rich, old man suffers a heart attack, his shadow escapes from him. The evil shadow descends on the farm, terrorizing our happy threesome.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai buys a new cologne to attract Margaret instead of hanging out with Rigby like he promised.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Chowder needs someone to grace the cover of the first issue of his home-made magazine.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Muriel's nephew, Fred, a deranged barber, comes to the farm for a visit. Fred and Courage get locked in the bathroom, much to Courage's distress.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the ranger's cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the ranger's electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gate crashes an art exhibition opening party wearing a painted-on tuxedo!

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.desc: A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Scooch is bummed out because he’s missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When there’s a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, it’s up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they don’t have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The girl’s plans to attend the Governor’s Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a stranger, who claims to have saved her from the apocalypse in the outside world.

programme.title: Twister

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star as two people in the 1950s trying to break away from the ordinary without breaking apart.

programme.title: The Island

programme.title: Ruby Gillman: Teenage Kraken

programme.title: Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The ultimate Titan team-up! Godzilla and Kong face a colossal threat from Hollow World, challenging their very existence - and our own.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A Roman general left for dead seeks vengeance as a gladiator in Ancient Rome.

programme.title: The Last Of Us S2

programme.title: Mercy
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor must rely on her battle-hardened skills when the mafia takes over her hospital.

programme.title: The Nun

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Katherine Heigl and Seth Rogen star in this Judd Apatow comedy as an incompatible couple expecting a baby after a one-night stand.

programme.title: Snag
programme.desc: A lone wolf takes on a dangerous criminal organization.

programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a stranger, who claims to have saved her from the apocalypse in the outside world.

programme.desc: A memoir of Marine Anthony Swofford’s pre-Desert Storm experience in Saudi Arabia and stint in Kuwait.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Queen of Mystery Season 2
programme.desc: Queen of Mystery is back! Housewife-turned-investigator Seolok and passionate detective Wanseung collaborate to solve mysterious cases and cure the hearts of those who were wounded by crimes along the way.

programme.title: My Merry Marriage
programme.desc: A family drama that questions the true meaning of ‘happiness' by showing various aspects of marriage such as divorce, remarriage, and late marriage.

programme.title: Cinderella Game
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: KICKKICKKICKKICK
programme.desc: An office comedy drama with star actor Ji Jinhee and producer Jo Youngsik building up a content production company aiming for 3 million subscribers.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge
programme.desc: A mystery romance with a woman who wanted to have the world and a woman who risked everything for revenge.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Face Off: Studio
programme.desc: Trung and his brother are professional movie stuntmen. To raise money for a film director to complete their movie production, the brothers help a triad boss to smuggle illegal goods in exchange for his investment in the movie. However, they soon discover that they have fallen into a trap set by a triad…

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English

programme.desc: Today, in teams of two, the Top 6 contestants are out on the farm, and must forage from the plentiful produce to pick an ingredient to feature in a course for restaurant diners. But there's also a catch...

programme.title: Best In Chow

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Walmart has committed to selling AC BBQ rubs and Ced visits Walmart to learn about retail strategies and sidekicks. Mr. Bar-BQ arrives with new prototypes of their ideas and the guys are pleased.

programme.desc: We meet Muhammad Nurul Elahi in Niigata who grows lotus roots to fund an elementary school he opened in his native Bangladesh, and Moroccan Mohamed Aalla who trains at a soy sauce maker in Kagawa.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A high school team from a city northeast of Tokyo took part in a nationwide calligraphy performance championship. They hope to send wishes for a revival to people affected by a massive earthquake.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Tokyo's Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40% of Tokyo's Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of "NHK NEWSLINE" and the launch of "NHK NEWS 7." We also feature "Japan in Focus" moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Otake Ryoho creates meticulously detailed wood sculptures modeled on the shapes of natural motifs such as animals and plants. He talks about his work, including a carving of a flower that "blooms."

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Mt. Fuji's Faces
programme.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo?

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Many Japanese workers are using apps to find one-off jobs they can do in their spare time. The spot work market is also useful for firms impacted by labor crunch. We explore the benefits and risks.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A drug approved in Japan in 2018 involves just one injection for lumbar disc hernias, helping many patients for whom surgery was the only way to control the pain. We look at how it works.

programme.desc: When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it.

programme.desc: The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine.

programme.desc: When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: Granny and Granpa's Attic
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: The Long Grass
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Painting
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Super Christopher
programme.desc: Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: The Photo
programme.desc: Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Brainy's controlling nature gets under the Smurfs' skin, Painter and Chef come up with ultimate prank. // After accidentally consuming a love potion, Gargamel falls in love with leaf and doesn't want to leave her side.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Chum Bucket is replaced by a flower shop with a charming new owner. // The Krusty Krab enters a float in the annual Bikini Bottom Parade.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob celebrates the anniversary of his friendship with Squidward. Squidward does not. // Squidward's lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team. // Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds it's more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her girls' day with Phoebe and Chloe, but the powers malfunction and puts the group in danger. Max hosts Jinx, making Colosso jealous.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellview's leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: While trying to celebrate his birthday, Henry keeps getting interrupted by crimes going on in Swellview.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: After accidentally activating an atomic bomb in the Man Cave, Ray and Henry decide to drive it out into the Swellview desert in order to save their city.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When the Louds' road trip takes them to Hollywood, Lola is determined to become a star and land a leading role. // To help Mom make the deadline for her column, the Louds have to avoid the Casagrandes when they visit Great Lakes City.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Vanzilla breaks down. // Lynn and friends enjoy free perks around Royal Wood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Sergio stays at the Louds, he soon gets into trouble when he doesn't want to hang out with the rest of the pets. // Unable to get Lily to go to sleep, Mom takes her for a drive where they happen to witness a burglary.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Turtles take the fight to Bishop but she's ready for them... get ready for MECHA-BIHSOP! But when the Mechazoids go out of control, can the Turtles save humanity?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottom—whether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties. // Pat-Thos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina helps Patrick get back on-model. // The Star family takes over the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie bottles up their feelings after not making the fearleading team & causes unintended electrical outbursts. // After misguided efforts, Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura, Clawdeen & Frankie meet Twyla, a boogey monster, while having a sleepover in the library. // Frankie, fascinated by Kuma's scaritage, does a ritual unsupervised causing trouble for all Monster High's undead students!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Myles and Dylan come to terms with the need to be accountable and responsible for one's actions. Viola helps Myles see the error in his ways when it comes to Dylan and teaches him the importance of leading by example.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: It's summer, and Oliver and Anika have a whole new mystery on their hands - figuring out who their real dad is! But an unexpected guest and an invitation to a high-tech summer school sends them in a different direction.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: It's Rock Island's Octopus Festival, but there's not an octopus in sight...In an effort to save the festival Taylor and Nori set off to solve the mystery, while Lila is working against the clock to choreograph their festival dance routine.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: Banyo Queen
programme.desc: Angelie (Rica Peralejo) comes from a family of sorceress. As a tradition, everyone should have a virgin sacrifice before their 18th birthday to escape the curse. With the help of her Aunt Chada (Mystica), she hunts a virgin to stay alive.

programme.title: Working Beks
programme.desc: Five gay men from different walks of life are confronted with important choices that could change everything for them.

programme.title: Mang Jose
programme.desc: Having the ability of energy absorption and redirection, Mang Jose covertly saves people only if they rent him out. One day, Tope rents Mang Jose to help him save his mother who has been abducted by mysterious troopers of King Ina.

programme.title: Ika-13 Kapitulo
programme.desc: The birth of Angela (Anne Curtis) brings tremendous joy to the couple David (Christopher de Leon) and Sara (ZsaZsa Padilla). Angela would complete their union and makes them a complete family.

programme.title: Isang Lahi, Isang Dugo Sa Lupang Pangako
programme.desc: "Lupang Pangako" or Land of Promise --- that is what people call Mindanao because of its vast untapped natural resources. As such, several people want to claim it for themselves.

programme.title: Steal
programme.desc: When money is involved, trust is a big word. Four Filipinas based in Japan will learn the hard truth about money and trust as they get entangled in their own schemes.

programme.title: Nightshift
programme.desc: A young woman is stuck in the morgue - on her first day - working as an assistant to a pathologist when the dead begin to manifest signs of resurrection.

programme.title: Kusina
programme.desc: "Kusina" is the silent witness to the life and love of Juanita. It is her sanctuary, the place where she creates dishes for her family, her friends, even enemies and strangers. Through cooking, she gets to know the people around her, and in return, reveal herself to them.

programme.title: Xenoa 2
programme.desc: XENOA 2 : Clash of the Bloods is the story of Clyde who suddenly discovers his power, being the son of Drix, one of the three Royal siblings from the planet Xenoa. The other siblings- Eli and Zeus learned that Clyde started to act strange and unfortunate things are happening around.

programme.title: Paraiso
programme.desc: A schoolgirl, her married sister and their widowed mom works in a factory to support their brood dream of a life beyond poverty and the entire flooded neighborhood they live in.

programme.title: Tatsulok
programme.desc: Luzviminda (Elizabeth Oropesa), an Olongapo bargirl, was gang-raped by five American servicemen. The result of that molestation was a daughter whose father she did not know, and whom she later gave up for adoption.

programme.title: Maria Labo
programme.desc: A popular urban legend about a woman who devours human flesh.

programme.title: Wander Bra
programme.desc: An oblivious superhero, passed down her super powers in the form of the “Wander Bra” to an ordinary woman who becomes a supernatural woman every time she wears the magical bra all.

programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Hellboy

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Ce Qui A Été Et Ce Qui Restera...
programme.desc: For the last fifteen years, Thomas Fisch has travelled the Sahel and northern Niger in search of the Wodaabe Fula. Renowned for their cattle herds, the migrations of this nomadic people depend on the vagaries of weather and politics. Today some prefer to settle, whilst others maintain their traditional values.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien sets out to meet the Murph'ariens, an off-grid family. Their lifestyle is based on the prin-ciples of permaculture, maintaining the balance between the necessity of producing food and that of taking care of the soil.

programme.title: Aux Frontières De L'Histoire - La France
programme.desc: We go back in time to the France that existed before the creation of France. How was the country created? Where were its tiny to vast borders associated with great historic figures: Vercingétorix, Clovis, Charlemagne, Philippe Auguste, Joan of Arc? This is the adventure of an ever-changing country from Celtic to Gallic to medieval...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: ''Put a piece of the mountains on your plate!'' This is the motto of three-star chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, Emmanuel Renaut, who works at the Flocons de Sel hotel and restaurant. Welcome to Megève, where you can enjoy mountain cuisine and discover a rich land!

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien sets out to meet the Murph'ariens, an off-grid family. Their lifestyle is based on the prin-ciples of permaculture, maintaining the balance between the necessity of producing food and that of taking care of the soil.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix discovers that today is the day of the most popular fête in the land of the Wonderfolk: a celebration marked by an exchange of crowns. Whilst trying to straighten the one belonging to Big Boss Alix accidentally breaks it. Catastrophe, without it the event simply can't take place!

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquête, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: August 2015. Éva Bourseau, a 23 year-old student, is murdered at home. To dispose of the body, the murderer uses a method from the American series ''Breaking Bad'', an acid bath. And so begins an unusual investigation, in the privileged world of youngsters, strangers to this type of drama.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Nous Maigrirons Ensemble
programme.desc: Convinced that his portliness may be one of the reasons for his professional setbacks, Victor Lasnier, a writer and director, decides to go on a diet. He discovers an industry designed to take his money and his extra kilos.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: François and Stéphanie go on a double date with Roch and Gisèle. Rollande is finally about to live her greatest dream: a meeting with the author Danielle Cuivre.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: It's the festive season once again. After fifty traditional years in the family home in Saint-Sacrement, François tries to persuade Jean-Pierre to celebrate Christmas Eve in his Montreal flat.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: On the same day that Anémone receives her diagnosis of early-onset Alzheimer's she also has to cope with the arrival of a new director at the funeral parlour where she works as an embalmer. Shaken, she has no idea how to announce the illness to friends and family.

programme.title: Quand L'afrique Sauva La France
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam, meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Jihye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker who has a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: Behind The Shadows
programme.desc: Yun-ho, born weak and destined to die young, is drawn to his loyal friend, Jae-un. In the conservative Joseon Dynasty, Yun-ho disguises as a girl to confess his love to Jae-un before his arranged marriage.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter 2
programme.desc: The legendary dance series is back! In this all-female dance survival program, the 8 female dance crews compete to be the No. 1 team. Shownu and Monika will join as judges.

programme.title: M.U.S.T
programme.desc: Irene Kim and her celebrity friends set off on a romantic trip in cities like Seoul, Bangkok and Singapore, exploring the cities and experiencing the culture.

programme.title: Bituing Walang Ningning (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A tale about an avid fan that attained her dream of someday becoming a bigger star than her idol.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Kontra Bandido
programme.desc: Apo Lakay has once rescued Bochok and his sister from the evil clutches of Ka Turing. This time, it is Bochok's turn to rescue the oldman from the same villain. Will he be able to do it?

programme.title: April Boys: Sana'y Mahalin Mo Rin Ako
programme.desc: Popular singing duo Vingo and Jimmy, collectively known as the April Boys, brought the real life tale of their climb to fame to the big screen.

programme.title: Basagulero
programme.desc: Berto Banal (Ronnie Ricketts) is a hoodlum with a conscience. He can't abide taking advantage of other poor people yet he has no qualms on robbing a usurer.

programme.title: Matinik na Bading, Mga Syokeng Buking
programme.desc: Apolinario and his uncle Boyong came from a family of barbers. They earned very little and in order to make more, they pretended to be gay.

programme.title: Pangako ng Kahapon
programme.desc: Set in the picturesque abaca plantations of Bicol with the perfect Mayon Volcano in the background, this is a film about a greedy family, corrupt politicians and the hapless tenants whose lives crossed their path.

programme.title: Tootsie Wootsie (Ang Bandang Walang Atrasan)
programme.desc: Tom, Dick and Harry were falsely accused of killing a popular radio commentator and their girlfriends, Amy, Susie and Tessie were helping them prove their innocence.

programme.title: Sobra-Sobra, Labis-Labis
programme.desc: Pinay, a young and fragile lass whose vulnerability was exploited by her stepfather who was ne'er-do-well scattergood while Tisay, a perceptive flesh vending streetsmart whose openness to things around her made her an interesting character study for a new-sprung writer.

programme.title: Love at First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Kahit Sa Bala Kakapit Ako
programme.desc: Friendship comes to a test in this tale about the mild-mannered Efren and Nestor, the member of an underground rebel group. Efren became unwittingly involved with Nestor's activities when he was put under suspicion.

programme.title: Bakit Iisa Lamang Ang Puso?
programme.desc: The death of tycoon Ernesto Benitez left behind two daughters of different mothers. One was the ambitious Diane, who wanted recognition from her father's family and the other one was Jessica, whose privileged existence was shattered with the emergence of her half-sister.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 12
programme.desc: When Riggs visits his father-in-law (TONY PLANA) in prison, a walk down memory lane reveals an old secret about his deceased wife (FLORIANA LIMA).

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.
